profile:
Granstone is an Ottawa-based leading provider of custom kitchen, basement and  bathroom renovations as well as fabricators and installers of stone countertops.  
We can do anything you require from full custom cabinets, flooring, backsplash, and countertops.   We have also recently added an electrical division with certified master electricians on staff.
Whatever your renovation needs we can help you do it! We have a wide selection of granite and natural stone countertops. 
Granstone employees approach each and every one of their projects as if it were their own. We strive to create a professional environment for our customers in order to ensure that every experience is a positive one. 

Should you have at any point in time some questions, please do not hesitate to contact our knowledgeable staff:
-via phone (613-733-0391)  
-email (info@granstone.ca), 
or best come visit us at our Ottawa showroom located at 17 Enterprise Ave Unit I.
www.granstone.ca

profile:
Watson Electrical is a full-service Electrical installation and repair Contractor, that has been in business since 1983, serving residential and commercial customers in the Ottawa and surrounding area.
 
Our goal is to provide timely, professional and excellent service on every job we perform.
 
Our licenced electricians are provincial trained, knowledgeable and experienced. They are trustworthy and respectful with all customers.
 
We can help you upgrade electrical panels, repair old wiring, install new outlets, switches, and lighting. We trouble shoot and repair the electrical problem(s) in your home or business.
 
Our Skilled electricians make your home and business electrically safe.
 
We are fully licenced and insured.
 
ESA ECRA# 7000302
services: Commercial and residential electrical renovation, EV chargers, LED retrofit.
name: Watson Electrical

profile:
A Skilled Residential & Commercial Electrician in the Ottawa Valley
Mooretek Electric is owned and operated by Travis Moore. Travis founded Mooretek in the spring of 2020 and has been helping customers in the residential and commercial electrical sectors ever since. He is fully licensed, insured and prepared to take on any job that comes his way in the Ottawa area.

profile:
Anderson Electric Inc.’s mission is to be a recognized leader and preferred provider for our valued customers, by delivering unequaled electrical services, with total commitment to integrity and excellence.
Anderson Electric Inc. is an electrical contractor in South Eastern Ontario that deals in Generac® products and install them at homes and offices.
You can rely on us to provide a complete range of electrical services such as lighting solutions, wiring, lightning protection system installations, motor control installations, panel upgrades, and more.
